select g.id , g.name , g.first_drawing , g.swiper_images , g.detail , g.inventory , ifnull(br.num , 1) as browse
, if(uc.user_id , 1, 0) as collect
from bu_good g
left join (select user_id , good_id from bu_good_user_collect uc where user_id = #{userId}) uc on g.id = uc.good_id
left join bu_good_browse br on g.id = br.good_id where g.id = #{gid}
